com.complexible.stardog.reasoning
Interface StardogExplainer

public interface StardogExplainer

Interface for something which can provide explanations for inferences made by a Stardog reasoner.

Since:
0.7.3
Version:
2.0
Author:
Evren Sirin, Michael Grove

Method Summary
 com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explain(Expression theExpr)
          Returns the proof explaining why the given expression is inferred, or the empty proof if the statement is not inferred.
 com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explain(org.openrdf.model.Statement theStmt)
          Returns the proof explaining why the given statement is inferred, or the empty proof if the statement is not inferred.
 com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explainInconsistency()
           Returns the proof that explains why the database is inconsistent, or the empty proof if the database is consistent.
 com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explainInconsistency(Collection<org.openrdf.model.URI> theActiveGraphs)
           Returns the proof that explains why the database is inconsistent for the given named graphs, or the empty proof if the database is consistent for those named graphs.
 

Method Detail

explain

com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explain(org.openrdf.model.Statement theStmt)
                                                throws com.complexible.stardog.StardogException
Returns the proof explaining why the given statement is inferred, or the empty proof if the statement is not inferred.

Parameters:
theStmt - the statement to be explained
Returns:
A single explanation as the minimal set of Axioms which explain why the inference was made.
Throws:
com.complexible.stardog.StardogException - there was an error while generating the explanation

explain

com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explain(Expression theExpr)
                                                throws com.complexible.stardog.StardogException
Returns the proof explaining why the given expression is inferred, or the empty proof if the statement is not inferred.

Parameters:
theExpr - the expression to be explained
Returns:
A single explanation as the minimal set of Axioms which explain why the inference was made.
Throws:
com.complexible.stardog.StardogException - there was an error while generating the explanation
See Also:
Proof

explainInconsistency

com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explainInconsistency()
                                                             throws com.complexible.stardog.StardogException

Returns the proof that explains why the database is inconsistent, or the empty proof if the database is consistent. This function is equivalent to explainInconsistency(ContextSets.ALL).

Throws:
com.complexible.stardog.StardogException

explainInconsistency

com.complexible.stardog.reasoning.Proof explainInconsistency(Collection<org.openrdf.model.URI> theActiveGraphs)
                                                             throws com.complexible.stardog.StardogException

Returns the proof that explains why the database is inconsistent for the given named graphs, or the empty proof if the database is consistent for those named graphs. Note that, a database might be inconsistent as a whole but a subset of its named graphs may be consistent.

Throws:
com.complexible.stardog.StardogException
